formattedAddress: 515 E 72nd St, New York, NY 10021, USA
adrFormatAddress: 515 E 72nd St, New York, NY 10021, USA

originalText.text: Some staff members are careless. They will damage your property if you do not tip them. I am a monthly… paying hundreds of dollars a month and they constantly damage my vehicle. You can complain all you want and the staff will not care one bit. I have to go down in the garage everyday to check if my vehicle was damaged. I wish I can park the staffs cars and damage their property. Let’s see how they feel when their property gets damaged.

originalText.text: Writing with regard to your garage located at 515 East 72nd Street, East River 72nd Garage LLC. This garage scraped the front bumper on my limited edition Fiat and they refuse to own up to it. After avoiding my calls, it took nearly two weeks for the garage to provide the claims department with the footage of my arrival and departure, which unsurprisingly enough does not reveal any damage to my vehicle. Upon asking to be provided with same footage so I could review it myself, after waiting an additional 3 weeks I was informed that it is "Company Policy" that they cannot provide me with the footage unless my attorney subpoenas it. I now have to have my entire bumper repainted which will cost in excess of $500. The claims specialist even went as far as to mention how clean and well taken care of my car was yet her superiors will still not process my claim. I will never park at another Icon Garage again after this experience, even if it means going entirely out of my way or paying more money. They lost a monthly customer and someone who frequented other locations throughout the city. Disgusted by their carelessness and lack of integrity.

originalText.text: Big rip-off, paid $61.50 for two hours in the middle of the day, plus you have to deal with the staff who I think are recycled ex-cons.

text.text: Big rip-off, paid $61.50 for two hours in the middle of the day, plus you have to deal with the staff who I think are recycled ex-cons.

originalText.text: If I could give NO stars I would. I was standing by my car watching one of the valets back it out. He backed my car into another car. When I went to take a picture he wouldn’t allow. I have a scratch on my car. When I expressed how upset I was he told me I had to “relax and calm down”. He should have been extremely apologetic but instead blamed my brand new 2019 car that has not a thing wrong with it. The bottom line that no matter what the situation every car has a break. No excuses. They refused to refund me the charge that they OVER CHARGED based on the sign/advertisement. DO NOT PARK HERE. There are plenty of other parking garages on the block. Go elsewhere so you’re car comes out without a mark, scratch or dent.
